mapper.select: SELECT id, username, photo_name, album_id, album_name, photo_description, user_id, like_amount, creation_time, modification_time, url FROM photo WHERE id = ( SELECT id FROM photo WHERE album_id = ( SELECT id FROM album WHERE city_id = ( SELECT id FROM city WHERE city_name = #{cityName} ) AND city_id IS NOT NULL LIMIT #{albumId},1 ) LIMIT #{photoId} ,1)

SELECT id, username, photo_name, album_id, album_name, photo_description, user_id, like_amount, url, creation_time, modification_time, url FROM photo WHERE id = ( SELECT id FROM photo WHERE album_id = ( SELECT id FROM album WHERE province_id = ( SELECT id FROM province WHERE province_name = #{provinceName} ) AND city_id IS NULL LIMIT #{albumId},1
) LIMIT #{photoId} ,1)

SELECT id, username, photo_name, album_id, album_name, photo_description, user_id, like_amount, url, creation_time, modification_time FROM photo WHERE user_id = ( SELECT id FROM user WHERE username = #{username} )

SELECT id, username, user_id, photo_name, album_id, album_name, photo_description, like_amount, creation_time, modification_time, url FROM photo WHERE id = ( SELECT photo_id FROM photo_like WHERE user_id = ( SELECT id FROM user WHERE username = #{username} ) )
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO photo (photo_name, photo_description, album_name, album_id, user_id, username, url) VALUES ( #{photoName}, #{photoDescription}, #{albumName}, ( SELECT id FROM album WHERE album_name = #{albumName} AND province_id = ( SELECT id FROM province WHERE province_name = #{provinceName} ) AND city_id IS NULL ), ( SELECT id FROM user WHERE username = #{username} ), #{username}, #{url})
